title: I'm Bronze 4 and happy with the results
body: In may seem odd that I'm happy with being bronze 4. Its not like I'm planning on being competitive  and I get matched with people around my skill level. Sure bronze 4 has a ungodly amount of toxic players but I can't complain I just wish more people were happy with there placements because if some one in bronze 4 can be happy they should be happy with what they got put into

replies.body: I'm not doing Provisionals until I know I can play 1 champion lol
I kind of miss being bronze 5. It feels like that was way more fun
FInally, someone who actually didn't complain.
Just wanted say thank you for all the useful advice about being bronze 4

You know what is a joy of being Bronze 4?

When you can still abuse champions like Kassadin :D

Try him out! He's great at low elo :D

So is Vayne, apparently the pros say in solo queue unless you're some Vayne Mayne (IM SO FKING PUNNY) then you WILL git rekt...but not in B4

kass is really strong at every level....just takes some actual skill to do well in the early levels now. instead of just having a free laning phase and one of the strongest easiest snowball.
now he is just a late game monster, like he is meant to be. unlike say, cass, who is just straight broken all through the game if you know what your doing.
Actuall skill highkek. The only thing I like about kass is it discourages the enemy from picking kat. If he got gutted I would be happy.
Yeh, people should be happy with where they're placed. Alas we don't have a utopian community.

I would definielty like to see how your attitude is 6 months from now 8)

but good on you for accepting your place rather than crying like so many others have

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mncRYs8i,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-31T02:51:24.698+0000)
>
> I would definielty like to see how your attitude is 6 months from now 8)
> 
> but good on you for accepting your place rather than crying like so many others have

It shouldn't take you 6 months to advance any ranked tier beyond your level of competence. you really have nothing to complain about if you played for 6 months and didn't advance while consistently playing the game, lol. You can't possibly be that unlucky.

> [{quoted}](name=Bronze V Irelia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mncRYs8i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-30T11:35:48.958+0000)
>
> Let's be Bronze 4 buddies :D
> 
> {{champion:39}}

Gonna need a name change then!
